snippet.title: EVERSPACE 2 | TITANS DLC Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
EVERSPACE 2: Titans brings massive repeatable encounters to the star systems of Cluster 34 along with new enemies and a pile of loot to collect. Discover two exciting storylines packed with fresh gameplay mechanics alongside a cast of new and returning characters! 

Wishlisht today on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1128920/EVERSPACE_2/

Follow us on: 
https://www.facebook.com/everspace.game
https://bsky.app/profile/everspace.game
https://twitter.com/everspace_game 
https://www.instagram.com/everspace_game/
https://www.reddit.com/r/EverspaceGame/ 
http://discord.gg/rockfishgames
